Visual Regression Testing VRT is the crucial process of ensuring that recent code changes haven't accidentally broken the visual appearance of your application. It confirms that buttons layouts and text appear exactly as intended for the end-user across every release.

In the legacy setup implementing VRT meant manually integrating multiple components and writing custom code to handle image buffers and external Jest matchers. This introduced significant false positives flagging irrelevant pixel shifts.
